about_the_game:
"Red Memories" is a captivating first-person shooter game that will immerse you in the tense battlefields of the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Korean War.

In the game, you will play as a brave soldier of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, engaging in fierce combat against the relentless onslaught of enemies.



Set against the backdrop of real historical events, the game will depict the heroic deeds of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army on the Korean battlefield, allowing players to personally experience the tense atmosphere and crucial moments of that wartime period.

The game offers a variety of equipment and weapons from the World War II era, allowing players to choose different weapons to adapt to various combat situations.



The Chinese People's Volunteer Army never retreats.

content_descriptors.notes: After using firearms to shoot enemies, there will be depiction of bleeding, bodily harm, and other content, including the portrayal of corpses and violence.
